judges: Before Kephart, O. J., Schaffer, Drew, Linn, Stern and Barnes, JJ.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed on the opinion of the Superior Court, which appears in 115 Pa. Superior Ct. 1.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Frank R. 8. Kaplan, with him Alexander H. Sehullman and Harold H. Harter, for appellant.
Harland I. Casteel, with him William Le Qoullon, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Santer, Appellant, v. Santer.
Argued October 13, 1936.
Before Kephart, O. J., Schaffer, Drew, Linn, Stern and Barnes, JJ.
Frank R. 8. Kaplan, with him Alexander H. Sehullman and Harold H. Harter, for appellant.
Harland I. Casteel, with him William Le Qoullon, for appellee.
November 23, 1936:
